data.name: StartOverErrorMessage
data.value:
初始化时出错.
请选择帮助->检查问题来检查问题.

data.name: Successfully downloaded fresh index backups. You may now use [Start Over] to apply them, if desired.
data.value: 已成功下载新索引备份. 如果需要，您现在可以使用[重新开始]应用它们.

data.name: The Modlist was cleaned up successfully.
This can take up to roughly an hour, depending on computer specs.
data.value: 这可能需要大约一个小时，具体取决于计算机配置.

data.name: This will download index backups from the internet. Proceed?
data.value: 这将从internet下载索引备份.继续

data.name: This will rebuild the TexTools cache. This may take up to 5 minutes if you have many mods installed.
data.value: 这将重建TexTools缓存. 如果安装了多个MOD，这可能需要5分钟.

data.name:
This will recover unused space in the game files by defragmenting the modded DAT files.
Please do not close TexTools or open FFXIV until this operation is complete
data.value:
这将通过整理修改后的DAT文件来恢复游戏文件中未使用的空间.
在此操作完成之前，请不要关闭TextTools或打开FF14

data.name:
This will scan the entire FFXIV file system for new item sets.
This operation can take up to an hour. Are you sure you wish to proceed?.
data.value:
这将扫描整个FF14文件系统以查找新的项目集.
此操作可能需要一个小时. 您确定要继续吗？.

data.name:
This will update the Modlist to ensure all modded files are labeled under the correct items.
As the Queue currently has a large amount of files still processing, this operation may take an extended amount of time to complete. (Up to one hour)
data.value:
这将更新Mod列表，以确保所有修改过的文件都标记在正确的项目下.
由于队列当前有大量文件仍在处理， 此操作可能需要较长的时间才能完成. （最多一小时）

data.name:
This will update the Modlist to ensure all modded files are labeled under the correct items.
This may take up to 5 minutes to complete.
data.value:
这将更新Mod列表，以确保所有修改过的文件都标记在正确的项目下.
这可能需要5分钟才能完成.

如果您想保留您的Mod，建议您在较旧的TexTools版本中创建一个备份Mod包，然后将其导入到此版本中.

data.name: FFXIV is set to DX9 Mode. This may cause issues with some mods and will reduce the available mod data limit.

data.name: Invalid or Unknown Data Type.
data.value: 无效或未知的数据类型.

data.value: 材质和纹理将复制到目标根文件夹.

data.name: Mod Data Offset is invalid. The Mod will be disabled, deleted, and the mod slot will be purged from the ModList.
